GTG everyone, c ya all tomorrow.

::Zardus/DevilDuer::

Zardus' wrist comp notifies the Alliance commander of a new bot outside the 
Alliance base, Zardus looking down at the screen. The external defences were 
locked on, ready to fire. Zardus quickly slams his finger down on a button, 
stopping the autoguns from opening fire on the new bot. He taps his comm-link.

"Devil?" he says into it, "There's a new bot outside, wanting to join us, can 
you let it in?"

"Yeah, boss, I'm on it," DevilDuer's voice replies, Zardus walking off toward 
the lab.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer walks out of his quarters, exiting the Alliance base.

"Hey," he says to the bot outside, "Ya wanna join? I'm DevilDuer, who are 
you?"
